description: Press the mouse to hear the melody. Particles generate different notes based on their vertical position: those in the lower half of the canvas play a C4 note, while those in the upper half produce an E4 note.

name: Particles.
description: This project merges visual art and sound through an interactive particle system that simulates ethereal smoke. Each particle generates sound based on its vertical position, inviting users to engage with the experience. Keyboard controls allow manipulation of volume and filter frequency, enhancing interactivity and immersing viewers in a serene auditory landscape.
